type.description:
## Smeltable

---



[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/smeltable)

Checks if the item stack is an ingredient used in a smelting recipe.

Type ID: `origins:smeltable`




---

### Examples

```json
"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:smeltable"
}
```
